children.title: JS Shell
JS ENV
View JS
children.uri: javascript:s=document.getElementsByTagName('SCRIPT'); d=window.open().document; /*140681*/d.open();d.close(); b=d.body; function trim(s){return s.replace(/^\s*\n/, '').replace(/\s*$/, ''); }; function add(h){b.appendChild(h);} function makeTag(t){return d.createElement(t);} function makeText(tag,text){t=makeTag(tag);t.appendChild(d.createTextNode(text)); return t;} add(makeText('style', 'iframe{width:100%;height:18em;border:1px solid;')); add(makeText('h3', d.title='Scripts in ' + location.href)); for(i=0; i<s.length; ++i) { if (s[i].src) { add(makeText('h4','script src=%22' + s[i].src + '%22')); iframe=makeTag('iframe'); iframe.src=s[i].src; add(iframe); } else { add(makeText('h4','Inline script')); add(makeText('pre', trim(s[i].innerHTML))); } } void 0

children.title: Media Rip
children.uri: javascript:(function(xs){ for(var i = 0;i < xs.length;++i){ if(xs[i].currentSrc){ return window.open(xs[i].currentSrc); } } })(document.querySelectorAll('audio,video'));

children.title: KeyZoom
children.uri: javascript:if(!window.doneZoomNow){void(window.doneZoomNow=true);void(document.attachEvent('onkeypress',function () {var affectedElement=(document.compatMode=='CSS1Compat')?document.documentElement:document.body;if(window.event&&!event.srcElement.tagName.match(/^(input|select|button|textarea|a|anchor)$/i)){var keyUsed=String.fromCharCode(event.keyCode);var curNum=affectedElement.style.zoom?parseFloat(affectedElement.style.zoom):1;if(keyUsed=='+'&&curNum<10){curNum+=0.1;if(curNum>10){curNum=10;}affectedElement.style.zoom=curNum;window.defaultStatus='Page zoom set to: '+Math.round(curNum*100)+'%';}else if(keyUsed=='-'&&curNum>0.2){curNum-=0.1;if(curNum<0.2){curNum=0.2;}affectedElement.style.zoom=curNum;window.defaultStatus='Page zoom set to: '+Math.round(curNum*100)+'%';}else if(keyUsed=='*'){affectedElement.style.zoom=1;window.defaultStatus='Page zoom set to: 100%';}}}));void(window.defaultStatus='Page zoom set to: 100%');}

children.title: CSSDOM
Stylesheets
children.uri: javascript:var MTl=document.getElementsByTagName('link');for(var MTi=0,MTr,MTa=[];MTl[MTi];MTi++){if(MTr=MTl[MTi].getAttribute('rel')){if(MTr.toLowerCase().indexOf('stylesheet')+1){MTa[MTa.length]=MTl[MTi];}}}if(!MTa.length){alert('This page does not use any linked stylesheets');}else if(MTa.length==1){void(window.open(MTa[0].href));}else{var MTw=window.open('');MTw.document.open();MTw.document.write('Stylesheets for '+document.title+'<\/title><\/head><body><h1>Stylesheets for '+document.title+'<\/h1><p>');for(MTi=0;MTa[MTi];MTi++){MTw.document.write('<a href=\''+MTa[MTi].href+'\'>'+(MTa[MTi].title?MTa[MTi].title:MTa[MTi].getAttribute('href').replace(/^data:.*$/i,'data:URI').replace(/\/$/,'').replace(/^.*\//,''))+'<\/a><br>');}MTw.document.write('<\/p><\/body><\/html>');MTw.document.close();}

children.title: Human SRC
children.uri: javascript:for(var imCt=0;document.images[imCt];imCt++){void(document.images[imCt].onclick=function () {var inStr=this.src.replace(/.*\/([^\/]*)/g,'$1').replace(/\.[^\.\/]*$/g,'').replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi,' ');for(var lastChr=' ',outStr='',oI=0,theChr;theChr=inStr.charAt(oI);oI++){outStr+=lastChr.match(/\s/)?theChr.toUpperCase():theChr.toLowerCase();lastChr=theChr;}if((window.brbanta=prompt('Human format SRC:\n(Click OK to insert this text before the image)',outStr))&&this.parentNode){this.parentNode.insertBefore(document.createTextNode(' '+brbanta),this);}});}

children.title: Image ALT
children.uri: javascript:for(var imCt=0;document.images[imCt];imCt++){void(document.images[imCt].onclick=function () {if(this.alt){if((window.brbanta=prompt('Image ALT text:\n(Click OK to insert this text before the image)',this.alt))&&this.parentNode){this.parentNode.insertBefore(document.createTextNode(' '+brbanta),this);}}else{alert('There is no ALT text for this image');}});}

children.title: Image HTML
children.uri: javascript:for(var imCt=0;document.images[imCt];imCt++){void(document.images[imCt].onclick=function () {if(typeof(window.brbanta=prompt('Image HTML:\n(You can also change the HTML here and click OK to replace the original)',this.outerHTML))==typeof('boo')){this.outerHTML=brbanta;}});}
